Editors' Picks

Effortless Meals Made Quickly

$150

The Instant Pot has become indispensable to home cooks the world over. The sleek Ultra upgrade version adds a user-friendly knob interface, sous vide functionality and more on top of its pressure cook, sauté and steam settings.

Lesley Stockton, Kitchen Writer, Wirecutter

Buy Now

A Portable Backup Drive

$70

Most of us have photos, music and data we'd like to keep backed up or take with us when we hit the road. This 2TB external drive from Seagate is perfect for either purpose. And it's speedy, so you're not waiting around to load a movie or fire up a playlist.

Alan Henry, Editor, Smarter Living

Buy Now

For Campouts and Sleepovers

$60

The colorful REI Kindercone is warm enough for most three-season camping trips, plush enough for the hard floor of the school gym and tough enough to serve as a vehicle for sliding down stairs.  

Kalee Thompson, Senior Editor, Wirecutter

Read: Wirecutter Reviews Best Kids Sleeping Bags
Buy Now

Ceramics for Stacking

$53 - 290

Available in powdery coral, teal, mint, yellow and blue, the Unison ceramic tableware collection from Schneid is designed to be mixed up and stacked high for sculptural appeal even when not in use. Each piece is glazed only on the inside, leaving a matte exterior.

Tim McKeough, Design Writer
